text:
<bos><start_of_turn>user
Who are the 'Cleaners' in Gachiakuta?<end_of_turn>
<start_of_turn>model
The Cleaners are an organization of Givers dedicated to hunting down and exterminating trash-beasts in the Pit. Led by figures like Enjin, they protect human settlements while utilizing their Vital Instruments.<end_of_turn>

<bos><start_of_turn>user
Describe Rudo's Vital Instrument.<end_of_turn>
<start_of_turn>model
Rudo wields a pair of gloves called '3R' from the Watchman series. These gloves allow him to give life to trash and objects he touches, turning discarded items into powerful tools.<end_of_turn>
